subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: All 18 players on Eritrea’s national team flew home after a 3-1 defeat at Rwanda in a match Tuesday that knocked the team out of 2014 World Cup qualification.
snippet: All 18 players on Eritrea’s national team flew home after a 3-1 defeat at Rwanda in a match Tuesday that knocked the team out of 2014 World Cup qualification.
